comment: /**  * Wrap the specific {@link XADataSource} and enroll it with a JTA  * {@link TransactionManager}.  * @param dataSource the data source to wrap  * @return the wrapped data source  * @throws Exception if the data source cannot be wrapped  */
code: /**  * Wrap the specific {@link XADataSource} and enroll it with a JTA  * {@link TransactionManager}.  * @param dataSource the data source to wrap  * @return the wrapped data source  * @throws Exception if the data source cannot be wrapped  */ DataSource wrapDataSource(XADataSource dataSource) throws Exception.
